artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Taunus Textildruck Zimmer; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc., Larsen Design Studio
text: Inspiration comes from many sources. Larsen has traveled extensively and his design sensibility has been influenced by the natural environment and aesthetics of many cultures and geographical regions. The flamboyant motifs and colors of Samarkand are borrowed from the spring flowering in the Asiatic steppes.
title: Samarkand
